author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
DOOM: The Dark Ages | Hugo Martin's Game Director Playthrough - Ch. 17 Featuring a Ripatorium 2.0 Preview!!!

Join us as DOOM: The Dark Ages' Game Director Hugo Martin plays a preview build of Ripatorium 2.0 while providing his unique insights into the game’s design.

Our weekly DOOM Eternal Mods Spotlight features the following:
Sentinel Axe - Custom Weapon by T0yOta
https://mods.bethesda.net/en/doometernal/details/531971
📝 Swaps Hammer to thrown Sentinel Axe like the Marauder uses.

Immoran Skin Pack by Cuzzmotion
https://mods.bethesda.net/en/doometernal/details/83867
📝 Gives some of the heavy demons a cosmetic makeover.

Unreclaimed Earth - Master Level by idk929
https://mods.bethesda.net/en/doometernal/details/90151
📝Reclaimed Earth Master Level. Comes in Balanced and Unbalanced versions.

For more information on all things DOOM: The Dark Ages and id Software, follow these channels and join the Slayers Club.  

Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/doom.com
Twitter: https://x.com/DOOM
title: Slayers Club Live | DOOM: The Dark Ages | w/ Hugo Martin - Ch. 17 Ripatorium 2.0 Preview!
